thread.title: Mikaela Shiffrin Is Edged Out for a Medal in Slalom

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Mikaela Shiffrin Is Edged Out for a Medal in Slalom
text:
Mikaela Shiffrin couldn’t overcome a half-second deficit in the slalom on Friday and finished fourth in her best event.
She was .77 ahead of the leader at one point on her second run but lost time in the lower section and finished in second place with three skiers to go.
Sweden’s Frida Handsdotter skied after Shiffrin, taking first place...
